name: protocol
title: Protocol
description: A method used during an action.

fields.name: protocolID
fields.title: Protocol ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: protocolType
fields.title: Protocol Type
fields.description: A category that best matches the nature of a Protocol.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: protocolTypeIRI
fields.title: Protocol Type IRI
fields.description: An IRI of a controlled vocabulary value for the type of Protocol.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: protocolTypeVocabulary
fields.title: Protocol Type Vocabulary
fields.description: A reference to a controlled vocabulary in which the definition of a value in protocolType is given.

fields.name: protocolName
fields.title: Protocol Name
fields.examples: `ad hoc observation`; `bottom trawl`; `point count`; `UV light trap`

fields.name: protocolReference
fields.title: Protocol Reference
fields.description: A bibliographic reference in which a Protocol is mentioned.

fields.name: protocolRemarks
fields.title: Protocol Remarks
fields.description: Comments or notes about a Protocol.
